raw_body: MARY passed away peacefully in the early hours of 18th February 2024 at her home “Mount Vernon” in Waragoda,​ Kelaniya. Beloved wife to late Clive Maurice Goonetilleke and most cherished mother to Tishan Goonetilleke (son),​ his wife Rosemarie Goonetilleke,​ Niranjala Perera (daughter) and her husband Dushan Perera,​ grandmother to Denise,​ Mavin,​ Nadeera,​ Dylan,​ Naomi and Tamara,​ great-grandmother to Elijah,​ Isabella,​ Gabriel,​ Jedidiah,​ Nicholas,​ Zara,​ Nia,​ Zachariah and Niall. She will remain at her home until the burial at 4.00 p.m. on 20th February 2024 at St. Theresa’s Church,​ Kelaniya. May she rest in peace in Heaven with our Lord Jesus Christ.    012250
